hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that ReDead and Gibdo have their own version of Sun's Song that freezes you?

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #3# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Theater

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Left Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Chest On Fire

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

LH (Lab).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Lens of Truth#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #an Ice Trap# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Spike Walls Left Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Boss Key Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.
